title: Ep. 777 The Footnote That Could Blow the Lid Off of Spygate
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address a footnote in the warrant application to spy on a former member of the Trump team that could blow this case wide open. I also address the latest economic numbers. Finally, I cover the latest Russian spying scandal. 
 
News Picks:
The media isn’t telling you these things about the Russia probe. 
 
This Margot Cleveland piece addresses some stunning new information about Mifsud’s role in the Spygate scandal.
 
We should all push to abolish tax withholding; here’s why. 
 
Is economic growth in the next quarter going to be even better than this quarter? 
 
Here are some of the details in the new Russian spy scandal. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
